issue.title: [C++] Make easier to use const ChunkedArray& with Datum in computation context
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1923](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1923). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently this only accepts a `shared_ptr<ChunkedArray>`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1923?focusedCommentId=16765127) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Shouldn't that hold also for other wrapped types (such as `Array` and `ArrayData`) ?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1923?focusedCommentId=16765141) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I can't even remember what I was thinking when I opened this issue over a year ago, so closing until there's a more concretely-scoped requirement
